Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Nagaritha Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Nagaritha Drive runs east from Rosecrest Street, and continues east to the City Wall. It is one of the longest roads in Oceancrest. Rosecrest Street is perhaps the longest street, though. It runs from the most southern part of the city to the north City Wall. It changes direction several times.
